home.title: Home
home.intro: Explore {{features}} in {{title}} with {{keywords}}, plus more locations brought to you by The Hidden Gaming Lair!

guides.title: Explore Location-Based Guides
guides.description: Discover all collectible and location-based types in {{title}}. Click a category to see its map, spawn points, and discovery tracker.
guide.intro: Looking for all {{guide}} in {{title}}? Use this interactive map to find every {{guide}}, track discoveries, and explore spawn points across regions.
guide.jsonld.1.question: Where can I find {{guide}} in {{title}}?
guide.jsonld.1.answer: Use this interactive map to locate all {{guide}} in ${{title}}. You can mark them as discovered and get more tips.
guide.jsonld.2.question: How many {{guide}} are there in total?
guide.jsonld.2.answer: This guide shows every known {{guide}}, grouped by map, with progress tracking included.
guide.title: {{guide}} Guide - {{title}}
guide.subtitle: {{guide}} - Guide
guide.description: Discover all {{guide}} locations in {{title}}. Use the interactive map to find spawn points, mark progress, and get tips for each item.
guide.spawns: This guide lists  {{spawns}} known {{guide}} across {{maps}} maps. Use the map tracker below or highlight coordinates directly.
guide.mapProgress.title: {{map}} Progress Tracker
guide.mapProgress.description: Track your discoveries and progress for each spawn. Right-Click on the icon on the map to mark it as discovered or undiscovered.

adblocker.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ad Blocker Detected
adblocker.intro: I've noticed that you're using an ad blocker, which is preventing me from displaying ads on this site. As a solo developer, I rely on revenue from ads and subscriptions to continue developing projects like this one.
adblocker.supportText: Consider becoming a Pro or Elite subscriber to remove ads and support the development of this website:
adblocker.keepAdsText: If you prefer not to subscribe, you can still support me by whitelisting this site in your ad blocker or Firefox strict mode.
adblocker.helpText: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to join my Discord server for support:
adblocker.thanks: Thank you for your understanding and support! üôè
adblocker.shortDescription: Disable your ad blocker and help keep this site free for all adventurers.
